item.title: Biotherm Homme releases kite surfing video in collaboration with The Dose skincare
item.description: Source: L’Oréal. Biotherm Homme, a high-end men’s skincare brand, has introduced “The Dose,” a product line designed to address the daily needs of men across four areas: feeling refreshed, energized, youthful, and charismatic. To showcase “The Dose,” Biotherm Homme has also created an immersive 360° video featuring Youri Zoon, a world champion kitesurfer, as he executes awe-inspiring stunts. Want to learn more? Experience it firsthand.
